content: What's the best way to use content of a Backdrop site on another Backdrop site? Use-case: Manage content of type event in one site, then: display events of a certain category also on the other site.

Simplest thing is just show an RSS feed on site 2
Or use Feeds to create nodes on site 2 from same RSS feed
Maybe other ways but thats what I can think of
Also thought of Feeds: Do you know if it's working with RSS? So far, I know of CSV working, RSS I'm not sure.
Well 99 active installs, and no one has suggested otherwise so maybe OK.
